p: In other cell cultures investigated, the concentrations of verbascoside are much lower than those obtained in our research but concentrations of isoverbascoside were higher. For instance, Verbascum thapsus callus cultures contain a maximum of 4.7 g/100 g DW verbascoside and 5.0 g/100 g DW isoverbascoside. Suspension cultures of this species reached 3.9 g/100 g DW verbascoside and 2.9 g/100 g DW isoverbascoside [ 38]. Callus tissue of H. procumbens reached a maximum level of 3.1 g/100 g DW verbascoside, but the concentration of isoverbascosideâ€”0.7 g/100 g DW, was higher than in our research [ 33]. Scutellaria alpina cell suspension cultures reached maximal content of verbascoside equal to 2.7 g/100 g DW [ 39].
